name: Hall Furniture
description: Are you looking for inspiring ideas to decorate your hall? Here are a sample.The double-door pantry closet has one stationary shelf with a weight limit of 20lbs and three adjustable/removable shelves with a weight limit of 15lbs each

name: Nursery Furniture
description: Original, authentic design Inspired by shapes and colors from one of our favorite modern eraâ€™s. This nursery furniture set includes a crib, dresser, and changing table topper, completing your little one's space in a snap.

name: Bathroom Furniture
description: Four solid wooden legs suspend the 71 long freestanding tub from the ground. Orchestrating this unique modernist design involved boldly re-envisioning the potential of the modern freestanding tub.

name: Bedroom Furniture
description: Hypnus is what dreams are made of. With a full panel headboard, slender legs, and clean lines, this bed sets contemporary styling.

name: Dining Furniture
description: A real American Walnut wood modern farmhouse table, paired with the eclectic to modern dining chairs or the matching bench made for this table.

name: Kitchen Furniture
description: Pretend stove burner features fun lights and cooking sounds Plenty of kitchen storage space, including the recycle bin, hooks for hanging utensils and tea/coffee cups.
